C

close() - Method in class de.mnl.coreutils.SimpleServiceTracker
Stops tracking services.

D

de.mnl.coreutils - package de.mnl.coreutils
Various helper classes, depending only on OSGi Core.

I

isEmpty() - Method in class de.mnl.coreutils.SimpleServiceTracker

O

open() - Method in class de.mnl.coreutils.SimpleServiceTracker

S

service(ServiceReference<S>) - Method in class de.mnl.coreutils.SimpleServiceTracker
Returns the service object for the specified ServiceReference if the specified referenced service is being tracked by this tracker.

Returns a service object for one of the services being tracked by this tracker.

Return an array of ServiceReferences for all services being tracked by this tracker.

Return an array of service objects for all services being tracked by this tracker.

SimpleServiceTracker<S,W> - Class in de.mnl.coreutils
The SimpleServiceTracker class simplifies using services from the OSGi Framework's service registry beyond the simplification provided by the ServiceTracker from the OSGi Core Specification.
SimpleServiceTracker(BundleContext, Class<S>) - Constructor for class de.mnl.coreutils.SimpleServiceTracker
Instantiates a new simple service tracker that tracks services of the specified class.
SimpleServiceTracker(BundleContext, Filter) - Constructor for class de.mnl.coreutils.SimpleServiceTracker
Instantiates a new simple service tracker that tracks services matches by the specified filter.
SimpleServiceTracker(BundleContext, ServiceReference<S>) - Constructor for class de.mnl.coreutils.SimpleServiceTracker
Instantiates a new simple service tracker that tracks services on the specified service reference.
SimpleServiceTracker(BundleContext, String) - Constructor for class de.mnl.coreutils.SimpleServiceTracker
Instantiates a new simple service tracker that tracks services on the specified class name.
size() - Method in class de.mnl.coreutils.SimpleServiceTracker
Return the number of services being tracked by this tracker.

T

tracked() - Method in class de.mnl.coreutils.SimpleServiceTracker
Return a SortedMap of the ServiceReferences and service objects for all services being tracked by this tracker.
trackingCount() - Method in class de.mnl.coreutils.SimpleServiceTracker
Returns the tracking count for this tracker.

W

waitForService(long) - Method in class de.mnl.coreutils.SimpleServiceTracker
Wait for at least one service to be tracked by this tracker.
